name: node-system-stats
description: Comprehensive library for monitoring system statistics including CPU, memory, disk, network, battery, and process information with time-series monitoring

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run build:esm
scripts.create-wrappers: gen-esm-wrapper lib/index.js lib/index.mjs && gen-esm-wrapper lib/modules/cpu.js lib/modules/cpu.mjs && gen-esm-wrapper lib/modules/memory.js lib/modules/memory.mjs && gen-esm-wrapper lib/modules/disk.js lib/modules/disk.mjs && gen-esm-wrapper lib/modules/network.js lib/modules/network.mjs && gen-esm-wrapper lib/modules/process.js lib/modules/process.mjs && gen-esm-wrapper lib/modules/battery.js lib/modules/battery.mjs && gen-esm-wrapper lib/modules/monitor.js lib/modules/monitor.mjs
